flycastsim.brick_spring_simple(k, m, d0, init_cond, times, car_speeds) → pandas.DataFrame¶

Simple brick-spring-car simulation Forced harmonic oscillator where a brick is attached to a linear spring and towed by a car on a frictionless surface. The forcing is a simple triangular car speed profile.

The function uses an ODE solver from Scipy for this.

The numerical integration terminates when the brick overtakes the car.

Parameters

  • k – Spring constant (spring stiffnes) [N/m]

  • m – Mass of brick [kg]

  • d0 – Initial spring extension [m]

  • init_cond – Initial brick condition [x(t0), v(t0)]

  • times – Boundary conditions [simulation end time, car “turn time”, car end time]

  • car_speeds – Boundary conditions [car start speed, car peak speed, car end speed]

Returns

A time indexed Pandas.DataFrame with the results from the simulation
